root.name: The Sims 3 High-End Loft Stuff
root.description: OverviewThe first item pack for Sims 3; players can transform their Sims’ homes into sleek, edgy lofts.FeaturesAdd a sleek, high-end, tech-inspired look to your Sims bedroom, living room, bathroom, office and den.Upgrade your Sims’ wardrobes with forward looking apparel, tailored suits and sophisticated outerwear.Transform your Sims’ homes into cutting edge spaces with contemporary inspired furnishings, eclectic art and modern designs.Give your Sims coveted electronics including high-tech, ultra-slim TVs, video game systems, stereos and more.As a special 10th Anniversary gift this pack includes three coveted items from The Sims and The Sims 2 games: The heart shaped vibrating bed, the electric guitar, and the aquarium.
